categoryName: Gift Ideas from Farm to Fit (Portland Only)
categoryBlurb: Whether their goal is to slim down, save time, lead a healthier lifestyle or simply eat delicious food, Farm to Fit has an option that makes the perfect gift to give together! They have created a program that will help you become fit, healthy and eating well as soon as you take your first bite. Farm to Fit’s delicious and calorie-controlled meal plans provide the quality and convenience you’ve been looking for.  Farm to Fit designs locally sourced, portion controlled meals and delivers them to your home or workplace.  Their weekly meal plans are simple to order, conveniently packed, and so good for you!

productList.productDescription: Farm to Fit designs locally sourced, portion controlled meals and delivers them to your home or workplace. Our weekly meal plans are simple to order, conveniently packed, and so good for you! We deliver you delicious and healthy meals so you can spend your time enjoying everything else in life. Whether your goal is to slim down, save time, lead a healthier lifestyle or simply eat delicious food, Farm to Fit has an option for you. We have created a program that will help you become fit, healthy and eating well as soon as you take your first bite. Farm to Fit’s delicious and calorie-controlled meal plans provide the quality and convenience you’ve been looking for. A great gift for new parents adjusting to life with a new born baby!
productList.productMetaDescription: Farm to Fit is a weekly meal delivery service for you!  Great group gift for new parents adjusting to new life with a new born baby!
